title: Chand Bali Jhumka: Polki Diamond & Emerald Cascade
materials: Natural Zambian Emerald Drops (approx. 15ct total weight)
features: Elegant Chand Bali design featuring a floral motif at the top, followed by a crescent moon-shaped frame. The frame is adorned with Polki diamonds in a closed setting, interspersed with a large central emerald. Graduated emerald drops are suspended from the bottom of the crescent, each finished with delicate pearl accents. The Polki diamonds exhibit a traditional, rustic charm. The open setting allows light to pass through the gemstones, enhancing their brilliance.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Can also be worn to elevate formal attire for a touch of traditional glamour.
description: This exquisite Chand Bali Jhumka embodies the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of Polki diamonds and Zambian Emeralds creates a striking contrast, while the freshwater pearls add a touch of softness. The timeless design ensures that this piece will be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique luster, enhancing its visual appeal. A true investment piece.
